documents.document: Strong coffee. Dropping the kid(s) at sport. And the dulcet tones of @pineyzb on the wireless. #kiwisaturdays
@AndrewGourdie me too. Can't go past Garagista. Not sure this 433 will be meaty enough. Arguably like the Nix :)
@AndrewGourdie I will report back.
433. The new @WgtnPhoenixFC beer. I think the name is related to the amount of money I'm likely to spend on it. https://t.co/pkDJeVBsNz
Win or lose, on the craft brews. #NixLevel https://t.co/DDP0PKil4R
@patrick478 you're so on message it's nauseating.
@AliChahrour94 on a shitty Tuesday night...
@Dale_Warburton @NZPhotomac @Yakcall not proud of what I did but it had to be done.
@FrontPgFootball dreams are free. Football stadia aren't. Maybe if we had a licence...
@robincrimp bet you have some sort of 4k set-up too so you could see every chest hair.
#WELvMVC that must burn Finkler being the time killer against his old team.
@FrontPgFootball but there isn't one...
@JonoNorman1 needs more hash tag
#WELvMVC the refereeing in this league is so substandard.
. @JonoNorman1 one shanked cross does not a summer make!
@mlsvljvc by game do you mean referee?
@raena ironically at the north end...
#WELvMVC not a bad crowd in. Better than last game. Maybe we should take the coveted Tuesday night slot on the regular.
@pineyzb Thought the return of the Mac went well; not a terrible headache to have.
@pineyzb Does Kosta warrant a start against his old club on current form?
@JonoNorman1 I'm not sure Barba is worth over half a million bucks a year either...
@JonoNorman1 having seen glimpses of his ability makes the disappointment all the more acute.
@tbgaustralia staggeringly just been dragged after contributing his usual.
@JonoNorman1 indeed. Nor are they. Is Roly the biggest disappointment in Phoenix history?
@JonoNorman1 this has been another tough watch.
@JonoNorman1 he's no Appiah.
Having relocated to the prawn cocktail boxes I can confirm the extra 2000 aren't hiding here. #WELvCCM
I am perplexed by the fact that anyone rates Rodriguez. What am I missing? #WPXvCCM
Crowd roulette. What will they pretend the crowd is today? #WPXvCCM
@bruno_smith22 @YellowFever_NZ @pineyzb @Dale_Warburton The Backbencher of course!
. @pineyzb could you not find someone full size? #hobbitdale @Dale_Warburton https://t.co/hwzUSFQ2dT
Surely there is a dog missing from the logo of this Italian wine shop in Petone? #doge @yasdh https://t.co/Rfo1jIcdpn
#NZFJeopardy. A: @pineyzb's last resort. Q. What is @Dale_Warburton.
. @Dale_Warburton #NZFJeopardy A: a valuable qualification which helps coaches progress in NZ. Q. What is a British accent (any will do).
.@Dale_Warburton Also in #NZFJeopardy: A: Essential tool for modern-day football transfers. Q: What is a fax machine?
@rpmaj @NZPhotomac @SimonHampton9 can't have current situation. Would make the world cup into the (laughable) club world cup.
@rpmaj @NZPhotomac @SimonHampton9 fair enough. I don't have a problem with it provided they preserve the difficulty of qualification.
@rpmaj @NZPhotomac @SimonHampton9 Could be right.
@rpmaj @NZPhotomac @SimonHampton9 interesting fact. What's your point though?
@brendangage not sure you've got apples/apples there. First one would have to be 'worse than racially abused' for them to be equiv?
Seldom have I agreed so wholeheartedly with the Hampster. https://t.co/XTXIdjn5rw
This could make life tricky for the ad targeting companies you've never heard of that know all about you: https://t.co/htHIMR5Mdl
@trustpower I live in Jessie St Petone Daniel. Not to be confused with Jessie St in Te Aro...
@masseyuni's Dr Mike Joy on the Environment Ministry (@mfe_news). A must-read for any Kiwi: https://t.co/THadq9i55I
Full credit to @trustpower for sending a nice man down my street to sell fibre that isn't available in my street.
This sounds right up @Arowin's alley: https://t.co/xZlnrTtyQm
@Dale_Warburton @Ryans_Rovers @tamcramer That was a golden shower Dale.
@TheACCnz Was that just racist from Paul Ford? Is he the peter leitch of Karori?
@robgreenwood1 @ALeague you forgot woeful refereeing.
@jonzey0 or time your run poorly and shit yourself... That feeling...
Allegedly 5.5k here. Terry Serepisos's accountant doing the gate receipts I think. #WELvADL
@eesterbauer today is particularly rubbish though.
@eesterbauer that is true!
@eesterbauer but other clubs already in the league cannot... #WELvADL
@eesterbauer are you bozza in disguise and do you feel the same way about Newcastle and CCM?
Metrics. #WELvADL https://t.co/zURzm8cKno
@tamcramer @patrick478 I'm a Welnix spy. Of the Mr Bean variety.
How good is Ben Sigmund at sideline comments! So relaxed with the players, gets candid answers. Tremendous. #WELvWSW
.@NZPhotomac @AdamRyan hmm the rose tint on those glasses is out of control. But great to snatched a result there.
@Dale_Warburton @The_Nighthawks that step over though...
@The_Nighthawks @Dale_Warburton like a hard news themed advent calendar!
@The_Nighthawks @Dale_Warburton the internet needs this.
@modsta not by a long stretch!
@JonoNorman1 but that is not anywhere near all of Sky's content.
@JonoNorman1 better solution probably regulation of Sky's monopoly position on content, but chances of that ~0%
@JonoNorman1 Don't think that replacing Sky with FTA is what is proposed?? "Sky may be a pain" is understatement of decade.
@JonoNorman1 history of FTA sport because of law, chicken/egg. You said 'potentially terrible' & I say 'potentially un-terrible'.
@JonoNorman1 but 3. anything that's bad for Sky pleases me. Other consequences secondary.
@JonoNorman1 1. similar law works fine in Aus, but in any case 2. presume $1k/household figure reflects intended support.
Good news for haters of Sky TV: https://t.co/2uXAhfbIdV
Denheath custies are the best thing @modsta ever taught me. Pledge: https://t.co/GuHPDVngJ6
@Dale_Warburton Rob Sherman going to put himself in the mix?
@nikz yeah but I'm all about my 10%. Your 70% is nothing to me.
@nikz only wealthy people are permitted to be tall, obviously.
@nikz 10/10 whinge but you can't blame folks for using the recline feature if it's given to them.
@SimonHampton9 @clevadix ugh don't remind me.
@andrewfantastic stop it! Jealous. Pick me up for a drive asap!
.@SimonHampton9 some high profile Phoenix coaches were frustrated with Phoenix players too I dare say.
@AndrewGourdie the same players who were frustrated with Ricki's tactics and training sessions?
The tragic state of New Zealand's newspaper of record. https://t.co/hrAf9Enu6Q
@ChrisKeall God help us all.
@rikdog72 I don't follow?
@rikdog72 plenty of contenders I reckon. Still a plumb job if you're a coach. Mark Rudan? Trani?
@andrewvoerman @WgtnPhoenixFC almost certainly their #1 issue to discuss today.
@rikdog72 He's the only assistant afaik that has been in charge in an interim capacity twice. Post-Ricki and post-Ernie.
Is Chris Greenacre the most experienced interim head coach in the league?
Ernie Merrick's departure has been exactly as his tenure has been: done with class.
I wonder how Roy Krishna feels today. Ernie finally gave him his chance & his miss has sent Ernie packing.
@Arowin You miss me and you know it.
@samfromwgtn not only a thriving Kiwi business but also the best place I've ever worked. Full of fine hard working people.
@Dale_Warburton Basically me: https://t.co/ifY3VjrWqg
@Dale_Warburton There should be an enquiry into how Marmite is still a thing. #Vegemite4lyf
Grim on SH2 this morning. @NZTAWgtn https://t.co/yPmNlcQ7J2
This year for Christmas I want: to make a start on the way to work if you are not asleep. What?
@Yakcall yeah I realise you were after recommendations. Let me know if you get any. I'm also in the market.
@Yakcall Actually that URL is wrong. Should be .co.nz
@Yakcall Can't vouch for them but seemed nice when I went in to chat.
@Yakcall There's a place on corner of Hutt Rd & Udy St. https://t.co/s5hoCpMtZl
Nerds of Wellington unite! So sad. https://t.co/iqEdPQVOIv
@The_Nighthawks @Dale_Warburton so much interest, really the best interest: https://t.co/aQOESzvdlJ
